sentences.en: A clog or fetter on the equity of redemption is void.
sentences.cn: 阻碍和束缚衡平法上的赎回板均是无效的.

sentences.en: a society run on the principles of equity and justice
sentences.cn: 以公平、正义为原则的社会

sentences.en: Aristotle proposes to cure such hardships by means of equity.
sentences.cn: 亚里士多德提出用衡平的方法来解决这样的困难.

sentences.en: Equity will not suffer a wrong to be without a remedy.
sentences.cn: 衡平法不容许违法者逍遥法外.

sentences.en: If the company is wound up the equity capital is the last to be paid off.
sentences.cn: 当公司停业时,股本资本亦在最后偿清.

sentences.en: She who comes to equity must come with clean hands.
sentences.cn: 自身清白方能获得衡平救济.

sentences.en: The equity of the referee's decision was accepted by everyone.
sentences.cn: 大家都同意裁判员的公正裁判.

sentences.en: The merged banks reckon to raise 4 billion dollars of new equity next year.
sentences.cn: 几家银行合并后明年有望增发40亿美元的新股。

sentences.en: The profit motive is inherently at odds with principles of fairness and equity.
sentences.cn: 盈利动机天生就与公平和公正的原则相抵触。

sentences.en: They are making a pretence of equity with serious faces, as players might.
sentences.cn: 他们板起面孔, 像演员一样,装出大公无私的样子.

sentences.en: They are making a pretence of equity with serious faces.
sentences.cn: 他们板起面孔,装作大公无私的样子.

sentences.en: They shared the work of the house with equity.
This became the characteristic idea of classical equity.
sentences.cn: 这成了典型的衡平法所具备的特殊观念.

sentences.en: This is another important decision and requires a knowledge of corporate equity.
sentences.cn: 这又是一项重要决策,要求了解公司“股本”.

sentences.en: To capture his equity, Murphy must either sell or refinance.
sentences.cn: 要获得资产净值，墨菲必须出售或者重新融资。

sentences.en: We will explore ways of achieving these twin objectives of greater growth with greater equity.
sentences.cn: 我们将探讨达到这双重目标前途径,这就是,既能在经济上获得较迅速的增长,又能在分配上较为平等.

trans.tran_en: a situation in which all people are treated equally and no one has an unfair advantage
